Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey-black in section, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of a black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394963) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394963)
